summary: Arnold Schwarzenegger and Lou Ferrigno face off in a no-holds-barred competition for the title of Mr. Olympia in this critically-acclaimed film that made Schwarzenegger a household name.
cast: Arnold Schwarzenegger|Lou Ferrigno|Matty Ferrigno|Victoria Ferrigno|Mike Katz|Franco Columbu|Ed Corney|Ken Waller|Serge Nubret|Robbie Robinson|Marianne Claire|Frank Zane|David DuPree|Eddie Giuliani|Danny Padilla|Denny Gable|Roger Callard|Paul Grant|Bill Grant|John Isaacs|Charles Gaines|Bud Cort|Tony Nowak|Dennis Tinerino|Patrick Reynolds|Jimmy Williams
title: Pumping Iron
